body:
1. Store all elements in a unordered_map(C++) or hashmap(Java)
  2. Run two for-loop: [first_entry, last_entry) as outer and (outer_entry, last_entry] as inner loop, do summation of key and check if the sum is present in the map. If not found, break out of outermost loop, and return Doesn't exist.
  3. Else return Exist

Creating the map would take O(N) and checking the existence of pair sum would take O(N^2)

So, TC : O(N^2)
title: ARRAY ELEMENTS PRODUCT
